channel.title: Install on if1sh
channel.description: Recent content in Install on if1sh

item.title: install
item.description: install 1.source vim /etc/apt/sources.list deb http://http.kali.org/kali kali-rolling main non-free contrib apt-get update 2.google pinyin or rime apt-get install fcitx fcitx-googlepinyin sudo apt-get install fcitx-rime fcitx-config-gtk3 init 6 3.zim 4.google browser wget https://dl.google.com/linux/direct/google-chrome-stable_current_amd64.deb apt install gdebi gdebi google.deb 进不去的情况 whereis google-chrome-stable vi /usr/bin/google-chrome-stable exec -a "$0" "$HERE/chrome" "$@" --user-data-dir --no-sandbox 5.xmind https://www.xmind.net/download/ 6.virtualbox apt-get install linux-headers-$(uname -r) -y && apt-get install virtualbox virtualbox-qt virtualbox-guest-additions-iso -y wget
